Bring everyone together with data
=================================

Go end-to-end from quick queries to deep-dive analyses to beautiful interactive data apps ‚Äì all in one collaborative, AI-powered workspace.

[Get started for free](https://app.hex.tech/signup?source=hero)[Request a demo](https://hex.tech/request-a-demo/)

Watch a full demo5 min

![Image 1: Hex Demo](https://hex.tech/images/home/home-poster/1050.webp)

Trusted by leading data teams
-----------------------------

All your workflows, in one workspace
====================================

Data exploration superpowers
----------------------------

SQL, Python, R, pivots, spreadsheets, charts, all together, all in a modular, notebook-based canvas.

[Explore Notebooks](https://hex.tech/product/notebooks/)

![Image 26](blob:https://hex.tech/898861bb77db442fe25731beee1cf2d3)

![Image 27: Pivot cell](https://hex.tech/static/edb9560556a5beac53bd0f7c2b1a3ffc/74fa2/cell-pivot%402x.png)

Magical AI, built right in
--------------------------

Generate queries, write code, create visualizations, fix bugs, and kickstart whole analyses - all from a prompt.

Roll up average retention over time for all segments

What would you like to know?

[Explore AI tools](https://hex.tech/product/magic-ai/)

Teamwork, that works for teams
------------------------------

Get feedback from peers, align with stakeholders, review diff views, endorse trusted data, and build from reusable components ‚Äî all in the same place.

[Explore collaboration](https://hex.tech/product/hex-for-teams/)

![Image 44](blob:https://hex.tech/844cc346e147616f8920b94f268e1691)

![Image 45: Teamwork](https://hex.tech/static/9b99e0dbb4f7331ba2d83cef71cc8838/1f491/team-work%402x.png)

Interactive apps and reporting
------------------------------

Publish your work into beautiful reports, data apps, and dashboards with a drag-and-drop UI builder.

[Explore App Builder](https://hex.tech/product/app-builder/)

![Image 47](blob:https://hex.tech/486612cd7d795796a54513499928edc3)

![Image 48: Actionable apps](https://hex.tech/static/3f9e93abb186ce09caae25d305575421/e6625/actionable-apps-main%402x.png)

![Image 50](blob:https://hex.tech/de164d611eb34f8f71fd86bb902a1e10)

![Image 51: Actionable apps](https://hex.tech/static/5f291fc12b45d2abf6cbe0c1876f363a/cc53c/actionable-apps-drag%402x.png)

A new standard for data work
============================

Hex helps 1,000s of teams do more with their data.

#### Rapid exploration on-demand

StubHub realigned its analytics stack with Hex for speed and quality.

Read more

#### Operationalized data science

ClickUp used Hex to turn a data science churn project into a cross-functional, customer-saving program.

Read more

#### One place for insights

Notion made Hex the one place for everyone, from data science to CX and sales, to make decisions with data.

Read more

#### Empowering exploration

Modern Treasury uses Hex to enable Engineering, Product, and Design teams to explore on their own.

Read more

![Image 53: Three G2 badges received by Hex for High Performer, Best Support, and Momentum Leader.](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmgv7yhaaeds/6YeFcloKHpe0I7Ax0ihCah/df75892072dc00db9f5865be3a493e33/G2_Badges_Q3_2023.webp)

### Users love Hex

Rated on G2 as an industry leader based on customer reviews. [Check them out](https://www.g2.com/products/hex-technologies/reviews)

![Image 54: Notion](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmgv7yhaaeds/45K7YZyXLDrOeeYIN7Vi3y/d20ebb5f53a1f1bf6e5a061d828f2b09/Notion.svg)

> Our vision for Notion‚Äôs data team is that anyone, regardless of technical proficiency, is comfortable using data to answer their own questions ‚Äî and Hex enables that.‚Äù

![Image 55: Abhishek Modi](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmgv7yhaaeds/5RiuLohiQMsh4b1JS12ZnY/5d04efeba4e1fbc5e491ac0735a89119/abhishek-modi-headshot.jpg)Abhishek Modi¬†¬†¬∑¬†¬†Software Engineer at Notion

Instant integration with the whole stack
========================================

Out-of-the-box connections and flexible APIs make setup a breeze.

[](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/snowflake/)[](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/redshift/)

[](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/bigquery/)[](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/databricks/)

[](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/postgres/)[](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/clickhouse/)[](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/mariadb/)[](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/athena/)[](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/ms-sql-server/)[](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/mysql/)[](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/trino/)[](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/dremio/)

#### Built for the warehouse

Hex has built-in connections to the most popular data warehouses, lakehouses, and databases. It‚Äôs easy to set up data connections, and securely share them with your team.

Learn more

[dbt](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/dbt/)

#### dbt metadata, docs, & metrics

Hex has a deep integration with dbt, including automatically enriching schemas with dbt docs.

Learn more

[Snowpark](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/snowflake/)[Spark](https://hex.tech/)

#### Push your Python

Hex has deep integrations with Snowpark for Snowflake and Spark (soon), allowing you to push Python code to remote execution environments.

Learn more

[GitHub](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/github/)[GitLab](https://hex.tech/)

#### Git it together

Export your projects to GitHub or GitLab to create an audit trail.

Learn more

[Airflow](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/airflow/)[Dagster](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/dagster/)[Prefect](https://hex.tech/product/integrations/prefect/)

#### Orchestration

You can include Hex projects in DAGs in Airflow, Dagster, or Prefect.

Learn more

#### Hex API

Want to connect to something we haven't thought of? Use our powerful public API to write your own integrations.

Learn more

Built for security and control
==============================

Enterprise-grade security: SOC2, HIPAA, and privacy regulations.

#### Flexible deployment models

Multi-tenant, HIPAA, Single-Tenant, and Private Cloud options available

#### Easy authentication and authorization

SSO and SCIM with Google, AzureAD, Okta, and more

#### Secure database connections

SSL and pass-through OAuth available

[Read more about Security](https://hex.tech/security/)

Build anything with data
========================

Learn how to do almost anything in Hex, from complex ML forecasting to critical business dashboards.

[View all templates](https://hex.tech/templates/)

#### Data Clustering

Unleash the power of data clustering‚Äîan unsupervised machine learning technique that uncovers patterns and groups similar data together without the need for labeled data.

![Image 56](blob:https://hex.tech/1daf3ee724e1681e51fa9c6173812934)

![Image 57](blob:https://hex.tech/4115b297876c59171da989573b6d6433)![Image 58: Customer Segmentation Grid image](https://images.ctfassets.net/mmgv7yhaaeds/5dt88O6GHV03GkU5U0XWtS/89ed42a46e81eb4771f20dcf7d7f89d9/Customer_Segmentation_2x.png?w=1680&h=1020&q=70&fm=png&bg=transparent)

#### Data Modeling

Take raw data and transform it into ready to use data sets for predictive models, interactive apps for exploration, or for company reporting.

#### Sentiment Analysis

Decipher subjective information in text to determine its polarity and subjectivity, explore advanced techniques and Python libraries for sentiment analysis.

![Image 84](blob:https://hex.tech/1daf3ee724e1681e51fa9c6173812934)

#### Time Series
